name: AS_GSS_TMG_BTN_manageImportReferenceTasksGridButtons
description: Contains the button layout for the import task grid.
sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  /*The button layout, which can dynamically be inside a section or not*/
  /*Note that when using this pattern of storing an interface as a local variable, it must be set to refreshAlways = true*/
  local!noTasksToImport: rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!allImportedTasks),
  local!processInfo,
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonLayout"(
    primaryButtons: {
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonWidget"(
        accessibilityText: "Press Enter to add items to process",
        label: "Add Tasks To Approach",
        saveInto: rule!AS_ADT_UT_startAuditProcess(
          newObjects: rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
            cdt: ri!allImportedTasks,
            field: "taskRefId",
            value: null
          ),
          objectType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS:TMG}AS_GSS_TMG_R_TaskRef',
          objectDse: cons!AS_GSS_TMG_ENT_R_TASK_REF,
          auditDse: cons!AS_GSS_TMG_ENT_A_R_TASK_REF,
          auditConfig: rule!AS_GSS_TMG_ADT_BL_auditConfig_R_TaskRef(),
          processInfo: local!processInfo,
          onSuccess: {
            a!save(
              ri!selectedTemplate,
              'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS:TMG}AS_GSS_TMG_R_Template'(
                templateTasks: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                  items: rule!AS_CO_UT_joinListsByField(
                    listOne: ri!allImportedTasks,
                    listTwo: local!processInfo.pv.auditParams.newObjects,
                    field: "taskName"
                  ),
                  expression: rule!AS_GSS_TMG_CDT_mapTaskRefToTemplateTask(taskRef: fv!item)
                )
              )
            ),
            a!save(ri!selectedSubAction, 1),
            a!save(ri!importStep, 1),
            rule!AS_CO_UT_saveNull(ri!taskImportDocument),
            rule!AS_CO_UT_saveNull(ri!allImportedTasks)
          }
        ),
        style: "PRIMARY",
        validate: true,
        disabled: local!noTasksToImport
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonWidget"(
        accessibilityText: "Press Enter to add item",
        label: "Add Tasks",
        saveInto: rule!AS_ADT_UT_startAuditProcess(
          newObjects: rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
            cdt: ri!allImportedTasks,
            field: "taskRefId",
            value: null
          ),
          objectType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS:TMG}AS_GSS_TMG_R_TaskRef',
          objectDse: cons!AS_GSS_TMG_ENT_R_TASK_REF,
          auditDse: cons!AS_GSS_TMG_ENT_A_R_TASK_REF,
          auditConfig: rule!AS_GSS_TMG_ADT_BL_auditConfig_R_TaskRef(),
          onSuccess: {
            a!save(ri!selectedSubAction, 1),
            a!save(ri!importStep, 1),
            rule!AS_CO_UT_saveNull(ri!taskImportDocument),
            rule!AS_CO_UT_saveNull(ri!allImportedTasks)
          }
        ),
        style: "PRIMARY",
        validate: true,
        disabled: local!noTasksToImport
      )
    },
    secondaryButtons: {
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonWidget"(
        accessibilityText: "Press Enter to go to previous step",
        label: "Back",
        saveInto: {
          rule!AS_CO_UT_saveNull(valueToNull: ri!allImportedTasks),
          a!save(ri!importStep, 1)
        },
        style: "NORMAL",
        validate: false
      )
    }
  )
)
